main event: Multiple individuals reported an unidentified aerial object sighting in San Antonio, Texas on September 7, 1952, which appeared to be saucer-shaped and displayed unusual maneuvers.
interesting points: The object was observed by several individuals, including law enforcement officers., The object was described as silvery and approximately 40 feet in diameter., It made a rapid ascent and disappeared from view after about 10 minutes., Witnesses described a dark orange explosion-like flash in the sky., An observer reported seeing an elongated object gliding across the sky at tremendous speed.
witness description: The observers included a chemist and law enforcement officers.
